JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description    Software development experience with minimum 5+ years of relevant experience    Experienced in Object Oriented Programming, data structures and design principles    Experience in developing quality code in Java, J2EE and Spring Framework in a product software development    Development experience on in ReactJS , HTML5, JQuery, JavaScript, CS, tools for Unit Test    Experience in working with tools like Maven and Jenkins and writing shell scripts to automate build, deploy of product code to cloud is desired    Experience in working with AWS tools and AWS APIs to automate infrastructure tasks is desired    Working experience in using container technologies like Docker or higher abstractions like Cloud Foundry is desired    Experience in relational databases (MySQL or PostgreSQL), writing SQL queries, fine tuning, debugging issues and database migration is desired    Exposure to work    Expertise in client server applications, exposure to cloud is an added advantage    Requirement Analysis - Ability to perform requirement analysis and definition in some cases. Quickly and in complete manner    Ability to probe and to bring in clarity of requirements    Ability to explore various technology/approaches with pros and cons
